## NumberFormat enum

Types for number formatting.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare enum NumberFormat 
```

## Enumeration Members

|  Member | Value | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  DECIMAL | <code>0</code> |  |
|  EXPONENT | <code>1</code> | Rounds the number to 3 most significant figures, and display them as exponent. For 1234, it is 1.23e3. |
|  HEX | <code>2</code> | 0x1234 |
|  OCTAL | <code>3</code> | 0o1234 |
